Dataset.Data:
select B.ModuleGroup from Sys_Module_Action A, Sys_Module B
A.IsDiv='0' and A.ModuleID = B.ModuleID and A.Valided='1' and A.NeedParam = '0' and A.SubAction = '0' group by B.ModuleGroup order by B.ModuleGroup

select B.ModuleID, B.ModuleName from Sys_Module_Action A, Sys_Module B
A.SubAction = '0'
and B.ModuleGroup = '#ModuleGroup#'
and A.IsDiv='0' and A.ModuleID = B.ModuleID and A.Valided='1' and A.NeedParam = '0' group by B.ModuleID, B.ModuleName order by B.ModuleName

select A.ActionID, A.ActionCode, A.ActionName, B.ModuleID, B.ModuleCode, B.ModuleName from Sys_Module_Action A, Sys_Module B
A.SubAction = '0'
and A.ModuleID = #ModuleID#
and A.IsDiv='0' and A.ModuleID = B.ModuleID and A.Valided='1' and A.NeedParam = '0' order by A.SNO
